H0.text: Seaweed in an ocean is the population that would be harmed first by a long period of drought.

H1.text: Fish in a lake would be harmed first by a long period of drought.

H2.text: Plants in a pond would be harmed first by a long period of drought.

H3.text: Fish in a bay would be the population harmed first by a long period of drought.

A4.text: Ponds that dry up each year, thereby killing resident fish

A5.text: This over-nitrifies the pond water and results in mass algae blooms and local fish kills
